{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.06200v1", "title": "Day algebras", "summary": "In this paper we show that the Day monoidal product generalises in a
straightforward way to other algebraic constructions and partial algebraic
constructions on categories. This generalisation was motivated by its
applications in logic, for example in hybrid and separation logic. We use the
description of the Day monoidal product using profunctors to show that the
definition generalises to an extension of an arbitrary algebraic structure on a
category to a pseudo-algebraic structure on a functor category. We provide two
further extensions. First we consider the case where some of the operations on
the category are partial, and second we show that the resulting operations on
the functor category have adjoints (they are residuated).", "main_category": "math.CT", "categories": "math.CT", "published": "2025-04-08T16:42:54Z"}
